messages.content: Nice to meet you, Antonio! How can I assist you today?
My favourite Rock band is the Bealtes
That's a great choice! The Bealtes are a legendary rock band.
When was their first album released?
The first album by the band is titled Please Please Me and it was released on March 22, 1963
What's the name of the singer?
The lead singer of the Bealtes is John Lennon.
